name: Zynord Infection
description: A virus called "Zynord" which turns humans into scary zombies is spreading in some rural areas. To create a successful vaccine for Zynord, scientists need an unspoiled sample of the virus. The SWAT team went in for collecting the samples. But unfortunately, they never returned to safety. Then as per the order of the government, a super-soldier with extraordinary abilities is investigating the scene. The story continues on his adventure in the zombie-infected areas. The destiny of the rest of the world depends on his mission.
